sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO businessenter( openindex, userid, storename, region, category, category2, category3, phone, email, address, name, inquire, rdate
) VALUES ( businessenter_seq.nextval, '$userid$', '$storename$', '$region$', '$category$', '$category2$', '$category3$', '$phone$', '$email$', '$address$', '$name$', '$inquire$', sysdate )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
storename, region, category, category2, category3, phone, email, address, name, inquire, userid FROM businessenter WHERE userid = #userid#
